### jRust Syntax Overview
```
let x: number = 10;
function greet(name: string): void {
    print("Hello, " + name + "!");
}
```

### jRust Syntax Overview
```
let x: number = 10;
const NAME: string = "Alice";
function greet(name: string): void {
    print.info("Hello, " + name + "!");
}
```
